author: sebb
msg: Added constructor to allow tests to work

author: sebb
msg: Initialise strings as empty rather than null to avoid NPEs
don't try to disconnect null connection

author: jsalvata
msg: * Reimplementation of the FileEditor reusing the WrapperEditor. Much nicer!
* Fixed some further bugs in the WrapperEditor.

author: jsalvata
msg: Making WrapperEditor more reusable... and fixing a few
things which, as I had promised, I had broken.

author: jsalvata
msg: * Made property groups visible in the GUI.

* Moved the responsability of wrapping/unwrapping JMeterProperties from the WrapperEditor to the TestBeanGUI. The WrapperEditor is more reusable this way -- and will survive an eventual removal of the JMeterProperty concept.
* Make WrapperEditor used only when the available editor does not provide a custom GUI component. Use the original editor's custom GUI component directly if available.
* Have WrapperEditor fire property change events when due.
* Created a FileEditor and changed the HTTPSampler's filename property to be a File.
* Added full internationalization support: property names and descriptions and group names are now localizable.

* Had the TestBeanGUI use the whole width of the edit panel for multi-line editors (a little hackish), putting the property title at the top... plus a little trick to remove the property label if you so wish (just set the property's displayName to "").
* Probably broken a few things in the process...
